I Published my game “Where is everyone?” A week ago and it’s still not categorised. Is there still a mod kicking around who can help? I’d appreciate it.

Posts.EditableText: Sorry about that. There's only a couple people categorizing games and it tends to get done once every few weeks in a big batch just because it's a tedious process. I've gone ahead and sorted yours into the category you requested.
